OpenAudio.description: Text-to-speech conversion using the OpenAudio S1-mini model

model.name: Model
model.tooltip: OpenAudio model object, obtained through the OpenAudio Model Loader node

text.name: Text
text.tooltip: Text content to be converted to speech

seed.name: Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed, used to control generation randomness

OpenAudioModelLoader.description: Load OpenAudio S1-mini model for inference

model_name.name: Model Name
model_name.tooltip: Name of the OpenAudio model to load

device.name: Device
device.tooltip: Device to run the model on

auto_download.name: Auto Download
auto_download.tooltip: Whether to automatically download the model
